metadata.title: CVE-2022-2250 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An open redirect vulnerability in GitLab EE/CE affecting all versions from11.1 prior to 14.10.5, 15.0 prior to 15.0.4, and 15.1 prior to 15.1.1,allows an attacker to redirect users to an arbitrary location if they trustthe URL.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
